speech:
*Welcome to Covid 19 Chatbot for India.*

Reply with corresponding codes to view more information:

*Basic operations*
1.View myths-reply with *myths*.
2.Frequently asked questions-reply with *faq*.
3.Know the symptoms-reply with *check*.
4.Know how to prevent getting covid-reply with *prevent*.
5.Donate to Ngo-reply with *donate*
6.View current case count- reply with *tracker*.
7.To view helpline number-reply with *helplines*
8.To view latest Announcements - reply with *announcements*
9.To view the creators behind this project-reply with *creators*

*Advanced features*
1.Diagnose yourself-reply with *am ill*
2.Find your nearby hospital-reply with *hosp*
3.Find your nearby testing centre-reply with*test*
4.Want to test your covid knowledge? Play a simple trivia-reply with*trivia*

To view this menu at any point during the conversation reply with *Menu*

To stop/deactivate the project reply with *Stop*.
